item.title: [[2022-07-28]] DSAC Referral Request Form
item.description: [[2022-07-28]] DSAC Referral Request Form Some Companies Require That Referral Writers Give a 150-word Description of Why They Should Hire the Prospective Candidate.

item.title: Why EAs Should Normalize Using Glassdoor - EA Forum
item.description: Why EAs Should Normalize Using Glassdoor - EA Forum Pros Matching: Allows EAs to find better matches when considering workplaces, leading to less turnover and general frustration when applying for/working at jobs.
